Host Discovery

ARP & ICMP

  • Active ARP only host discovery (LA: 

    # nmap -T4 -PR -sn -n <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

  • Active ICMP only host discovery: 

    # nmap -T4 --disable-arp-ping -PE -PP -PM -sn -n <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

  • Active ARP + ICMP host discovery: 

    # nmap -T4 -PE -PP -PM -sn -n <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

NetBIOS

  • Active NetBIOS name discovery: 

    # nbtscan -r <TARGET> | tee -a <OUTPUT>

https://nmap.org/book/host-discovery-techniques.html https://nmap.org/book/host-discovery-strategies.html#host-discovery-ideal-probes
